key_risks: Revenue decline due to challenging market conditions and increased competition
Profit forecast downgrade due to cost pressures and supply chain disruptions
Long-term shareholder losses with a 73% stock decline over three years
Supply chain vulnerabilities including increased freight costs and port congestion
Dependence on key markets (UK and US) exposing the company to regional economic downturns and regulatory changes
Competitive pressures in the premium mixer market
controversies: Significant drop in share price following profit forecast downgrade
Supply chain disruptions leading to higher operational costs and delays
environmental_issues: Focus on sustainability with natural ingredients, recyclable packaging, and carbon emission reduction
